item.title: Speed bumps, 20th September
item.description:
Recent works to the speed bumps along Lee terrace and Belmont hill are ridiculous. They have been made even higher and have caused damage to my vehicle while travelling at under 10mph to go over them. Not sure what the reasons for this sudden increase in size is for. Can this be addressed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Lee Terrace, Blackheath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 20th September
item.description:
Dear Council/Highways Department, I would like to urgently report a serious pothole. While driving to the airport, our vehicle hit this pothole, which caused a very large hole in the tyre. We nearly lost control of the car because of it, and we were fortunate that the tyre did not explode. This situation is extremely dangerous for drivers and could easily result in serious accidents. Please arrange for an immediate inspection and repair of this road section to prevent further damage or injuries.also we would like to claim compensation for a right tyre Mihails Krasnakovs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canterbury Way, Brooklands, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet
